TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Chenggong, title = Chenggong, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chenggong} }

S.FORM: Chenggong (Cinkong Song, ) mki sku Taitung. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 143.53 km (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 65.53 km , rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 1.94 km ), 11,992 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 4,552 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 7,208 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 60 . kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Amis ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebu Chenggong ays psgayun 8 ru 14 alang. 14 alang hani ga, Ciliksay, Torik, Sa'aniwan, Kalahaay, Kahciday, Madawdaw, Dadowacen, Folalacay, Cirarokohay, Tomiyac, Piyoxo, Mararo'ong, Pisirian, Paongaongan.
